name: Escape Artist (itch) (KratosAI)
description:
Escape Artist is an aesthetically appealing platformer. You control a rocket ship. Fly through all the obstacles and land your ship before the fuel runs out. Made by Kratos. Hope you enjoy it. Any kind of feedback is appreciated.

Controls:

Space - Thrust upward

A - Rotate anticlockwise, Thrust leftward

D - Rotate clockwise, Thrust rightward

Esc -  Main Menu
